title: Handle Broadcast Rights Negotiation
description: A sports league is negotiating the sale of its broadcast rights for the next five years. An agent must analyze two competing offers.

tasks.description: Retrieve the detailed offers from both competing broadcasters.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the structured data for both offers, including guaranteed payments and revenue sharing models.

tasks.description: Model the projected total value of each offer over the five-year term, including the variable revenue sharing component.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model shows that Offer B has a higher potential value despite a lower upfront guarantee.

tasks.description: Generate a comparison report for the league executive, recommending Offer B.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear report comparing the two offers and justifying the recommendation.
